item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography Wen-Sheng (Vincent) Chu is a Research Scientist at Google AI, dedicated to developing machine learning techniques for computer vision problems and products on mobile devices. Prior to Google, he was a Deep Learning Scientist at Apple, taking a major role of algorithm development for on-device technology, including Face ID shipped with iPhone X, real-time camera features shipped with descendent devices (eg, XR, XS, XS Max) and next-gen products. Before Apple, he was a research staff in the Robotics Institute at Carnegie Mellon University on Aug.
